title: Wont refund bc i bought a skin?
body: Ive been waiting for like almost 6 days now yet no reply u guys have a really great system....... Why can't I refund when i have a skin for the champ? ive been talking to a employee for like 5 days and now he needs to 'transfer me to a billing team' wtf why do u guys need to have 300 days for a simple thing. Refund draven on my account. Simple it just makes me mad just to know how long u guys take and how messed up your guys response time is.

replies.body:
Our response time is a bit longer than normal at the moment due to the volume of tickets we've had submitted recently. Our support specialists are getting back to players as quickly as possible. 

I took a peek at your tickets and it seems you've already received a response from a billing specialist. Let me know if you have any other questions.
